license.name: Sun Microsystems, Inc. Binary Code License Agreement

info.description:
The Java Message Service (JMS) API is a messaging standard that allows application components based on the Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition (J2EE) to create, send, receive, and read messages. It enables distributed communication that is loosely coupled, reliable, and asynchronous.
NOTE:You must download the JMS software yourself from Sun's web site after agreeing to the license terms. Once you've downloaded the JAR, save it as ${java.io.tmpdir}/jms-1_1-fr-apidocs.zip, where it will be picked up by this module's packager.xml file.
